sentences.en: " Just my sister in New Mexico, " he volunteered. " But she's a humble spinster nun. "
sentences.cn: “ 我有个妹妹在新墨西哥州, ” 他主动地说. “ 可她是个地位低微的老姑娘修女. ”

sentences.en: A spinster is a bachelor's wife.
He left his Montana ranch to his spinster sister.
sentences.cn: 他把他在蒙大拿州的大牧场留给了他未婚的妹妹.

sentences.en: However, some of college's crisis are originated her menopause chaos -- she is an old spinster.
sentences.cn: 但是, 某些学园危机是因为她的更年期混乱引发的 —— 顺便说下她是老处女.

sentences.en: I do not think Tom actually loves his spinster aunt . Its simply cupboard love.
sentences.cn: 我想,汤姆不是真心关怀他那个老去没嫁的姑母,只是爱她的财产罢了.

sentences.en: So saying, she pointed out to the spinster two napoleons which were glittering on the table.
sentences.cn: 她一面说, 一面指着桌子,把那两个发亮的拿破仑指给那老姑娘看.

sentences.en: There was also in this house, between this elderly spinster and this old man, a child, a little boy, who was always trembling and mute in the presence of M. Gillenormand.
sentences.cn: 在这家人里，除了那个老姑娘和那老头以外，还有一个小孩，一个在吉诺曼先生面前便会发抖沉默的小男孩。

sentences.en: There's nothing shameful in being a spinster.
sentences.cn: 当老处女也没什么丢人的,看看皮蒂姑妈.

sentences.en: These households comprised of an old man and an old spinster are not rare, and always have the touching aspect of two weaknesses leaning on each other for support.
sentences.cn: 这种由一个老头子和一个老姑娘组成的家庭是一点不稀罕的，那种两老相依为命的情景总会令人怅然神往。

trans.tran_en: an unmarried woman, usually one who is no longer young and seems unlikely to marry
